description:
Periscope is a spatial design agency focused on regenerative design and public architecture.

We welcome visitors to join us through a day of workshops and talks around some of the practice's recent works, stimulating conversations on green and blue infrastructures, master planning and urbanism, public realm and landscape.

events.name: Ecology Object Workshop - AM
events.notes: Attendees will prototype some ecological objects, guided on ecological requirements and practical building by Periscope's staff members.

events.name: Ecology Object Workshop - PM
events.notes: Attendees will prototype some ecological objects, guided on ecological requirements and practical building by Periscope's staff members.

factsheet.heading: Ecology Object Workshop
paragraphs: Periscope will open its investigative space, Microscope, for a creative workshop targeting all age groups.

The workshop aims to stimulate talking on themes such as Inclusivity, Community Participation and Ecology which will be put into action through the creation of a series of  ecological objects, such as bug hotels and seed bombs. The end results may be combined into one larger piece to be installed on the site of one of our projects.
Everyone is invited to participate in this creative exercise, all materials and tools will be provided by Periscope on the day.

images.title: Our Open Design Studio looks forward to welcome you all for a visit!

name: Periscope
